name: Ravva and the Cyclops Curse
description: Unleash your summoning powers to defeat the Cyclops Lord! Along with four unusual companions, you must journey through a dangerous land to save your mother from a terrible curse. A challenging adventure awaits!
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7 Prozessor: 2.0 GHz Arbeitsspeicher: 2 GB RAM Grafik: 256MB (with Pixel Shadder support) Speicherplatz: 500 MB verf체gbarer Speicherplatz Zus채tzliche Anmerkungen: Native game spec ratio is 16:9. Other specs will work properly but black stripes will be added. Compatible with generic USB controller devices, but we recommend Xbox 360 and Xbox One gamepads.
